note on sources: Dol. and Ukrainian books have a troparion and a kontakion to st. Joseph here. In is deleted in 1950 Horologion, so Anthology does not have it. I follow the Anthology here only because I don't want to make a translation myself and happen to have no English Vasylianka on me. Also, Dol. requires 7 stychera to be sung today, I think it's a typo as odd numbers don't exist.
day name: Synaxis of the Mother of God
kontakia: (Tone 6) He who existed before the morning star* and was born of the Father without a mother,* today, O Full of Grace, becomes flesh from you without a father.* Wherefore, a star brings the news to the Magi* and angels with shepherds sing of how you gave birth ineffably.
